item.description:
Hey Folks,

The Lansdowne Pub has a fun new twist on Karaoke - a live backing band!

No more crappy sound system and cheezy fake music behind you. Get up on stage and belt with the band.

The backing band is the "Jukebox Heroes". They play top 40 songs plus music from the '80s, '90s, and '00s.

We've reserved a table for up to 20 people near the stage and The Lansdowne is providing free appetizers for the first hour!

Let's get together at 8:30PM. That way we'll have time for a few drinks before 9 PM when the Karaoke starts. Nobody should attempt karaoke without having a few drinks first :-)

Come on out and channel your inner rock star!

I hope to see you there!

Your Friendly organizer,

Patrick

UPDATE! I've decided to make this a joint meetup with Boston Live Music, so if the event is full here, try signing up through Boston Live Music!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the guy with the ponytail who looks more or less like my profile pic. We will be at the "L-Shaped" table to the left of the stage.
item.name: Live Band Karaoke at The Lansdowne Pub!
